"Bergmann": "Thanks again for getting me that data earlier."
"Yo. You, uh, you got some time to spare?"
"I was thinking of asking you to do me another favor."
"I see... Well, come talk to me when you have some time, okay?"
"Now that you've gone to the mountain and the ocean I was thinking of where you could go next."
"Then I realized, \"Oh yeah, the wetlands are pretty close by.\" Almost forgot about that."
"It's a tranquil place, but trying to fight in knee-high water doesn't really make for fond memories, to be honest..."
"But I still wanna visit the place again, if only for the nostalgia."
"Do you think you could go there and bring me back some data?"
"Don't go out of your way if you're swamped, just if you're ever in the area. Thanks."
